proposal: Diving into the world of L2 solutions, Blass Node is making waves by boosting scalability and slashing transaction costs, all while keeping security tight. With 252 holders on the ETH network, you're clearly onto something big. Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further empower your community, allowing anyone to deploy and share in the revenue. Let's bridge our B2B tools with your vision, making blockchain more accessible and rewarding for everyone involved.
